com.soctec.soctec.network

Class ConnectionChecker

  • java.lang.Object
    • BroadcastReceiver
      • com.soctec.soctec.network.ConnectionChecker

  • public class ConnectionChecker
extends BroadcastReceiver
    This class listens for broadcasts about wifi networks. Calls for generation of new QR-codes when necessary. Can check if device is connected to Electricity.
    Version:
    2015-09-29
    Author:
    David Johnsson

    • Method Detail

      • onReceive

        public void onReceive(Context context,
                      Intent intent)
        This method is called by the Android operating system whenever a change in the network connection has occurred. Checks if connected to electricity wifi and updates the QR image accordingly.
        Parameters:
        context - Context in which receiver is running
        intent - The intent being received

      • isConnected

        public static boolean isConnected(Context context)
        Check if device is connected to one of Electricity's routers.
        Parameters:
        context - The context of the calling activity
        Returns:
        True if device is connected, o/w false

      • getNewQR

        private Bitmap getNewQR(Context context)
        Uses the QRGen class to get a new QR image based on the device's IP.
        Parameters:
        context - Context of the calling activity
        Returns:
        The bitmap of the QR

      • getUserIP

        Gets the device's IP.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The device's IP
